Object.Field:
COMPONENT NAME: JKM Oracle Simple (VIN)
AUTHOR: Vodafone
DESCRIPTION This JKM provides simple journalizing procedures on Oracle tables When starting the journal on a model, tables no longer in the set are unjournalized, tables missing from the set are journalized.
REQUIREMENTS The DB user of the Work Schema must have a SELECT ANY TABLE privilege granted directly (not through a role)
OPTIONS (Refer to Option descriptions for more information on each option) - COMPATIBLE: Optimize the code for a version of the Oracle database. - VALIDATE: Checks the settings of the KM
LIMITATIONS - If the table is already journalized and is present in another model, the current journal data will be lost and the table is transfered to the new journal set. - This Knowledge Module creates triggers on your source tables. Be sure to validate the scalability of your applications before releasing your developments in your production systems. - This Knowledge Module does not support LOBs. Please use Streams based JKMs instead.

delCmd = """ delete from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN where JRN.JRN_SUBSCRIBER = ? """ # Prepare the delete prepDelStmt = myCon.prepareStatement(delCmd) # Execute it for each subscriber for sbs in lstSbs: prepDelStmt.setString(1, sbs) nbRows = prepDelStmt.executeUpdate() prepDelStmt.close() # Commit updates myCon.commit()

delCmd = """ delete from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("SNP_JRN_SUBSCRIBER")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> SUBS where SUBS.JRN_SUBSCRIBER = ? and SUBS.JRN_TNAME = '<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>' """ # Prepare the delete prepDelStmt = myCon.prepareStatement(delCmd) # Execute it for each subscriber for sbs in lstSbs: prepDelStmt.setString(1, sbs) nbRows = prepDelStmt.executeUpdate() prepDelStmt.close() # Commit the updates myCon.commit()

import java.sql as sql import java.lang as lang
# Connect to the Source Database ie the one that hosts the journalized tables myCon = odiRef.getJDBCConnection("SRC")
# Create the list of Subscribers for a CDC Set lstSbs = [] <%= odiRef.getSubscriberList("" , "lstSbs.append('[SUBSCRIBER]')", "\n", "") %>

<% import java.util.HashMap; import java.util.Iterator; import java.util.LinkedHashMap; /** * * * An ODI Substitution API Extension class , to cover Vodafone Reusable assets * requirements that is not fulfilled by the standard ODI Substitution API . * * TODO document limitations 1. JKM/IKM - Is is possible to determine the phase * / KM is being executed? 2. Limited support for selectors (ordering) * * @see http://docs.oracle.com/middleware/1212/odi/ODIKD/odiref_reference.htm * @author Ayman Elwany */ public class CustomSubstitutionApi { public static final String DELIMITER = "" + (char) 1; public static final String RE_Q = "" + (char) 92 + "Q"; public static final String RE_E = "" + (char) 92 + "E"; static final String MISSING_FLEXFIELD_GETCOLLIST = "Exception getColList("; static final String EXPRESSION_NOT_SUPPORTED = "[EXPRESSION] not supported in getAllTargetColList"; static final String DELIMITER_REGEX = RE_Q + DELIMITER + RE_E; // Selectors public static final String SELECTOR_INSERT_AND_TARGET = "INSERT AND TARGET"; public static final String SELECTOR_UPDATE_AND_TARGET = "UPDATE AND TARGET"; public static final String SELECTOR_INSERT = "INSERT"; public static final String SELECTOR_NOT_INSERT = "NOT INSERT"; public static final String SELECTOR_UPDATE = "UPDATE"; public static final String SELECTOR_UPD_TRG_REW_UPDATE = "UPD AND TRG AND REW AND UPDATE"; public static final String SELECTOR_UPD_NotUK_NotTRG_NotINSERT_REW = "UPD AND NOT UK AND NOT TRG AND NOT INSERT AND REW"; static final String PATTERN_COL_NAME = "[COL_NAME]"; static final String PATTERN_DEST_CRE_DT = "[DEST_CRE_DT]"; static final String PATTERN_EXPRESSION = "[EXPRESSION]"; static final String PATTERN_EXPRESSION__NULL_IF_UNMAPPED = "[EXPRESSION__NULL_IF_UNMAPPED]"; static final String PATTERN_COL_NAME__EXPRESSION_IF_ON_TARGET = "[COL_NAME__EXPRESSION_IF_ON_TARGET]"; static final String PATTERN_COL_NAME__NULL_IF_ON_TARGET = "[COL_NAME__NULL_IF_ON_TARGET]"; static final String PATTERN_MAPPED_ON_TARGET = "[MAPPED_ON_TARGET]"; static final String PATTERN_UNMAPPED = "[UNMAPPED]"; LinkedHashMap cols, // contains all columns (getColList) allTargetCols; // contains all columns including the target columns // (getAllTargetColList)s /** * a custom representation of the table Column, the contains the special * flexfields as attributes * */ private class ColInfo { static final String PROP_TRG = "TRG"; static final String PROP_UPD = "UPD"; static final String PROP_UK = "UK"; static final String PROP_REW = "REW"; static final String PROP_FF_INSERT = "INSERT"; static final String PROP_FF_UPDATE = "UPDATE"; String colName, colDt, colExpr; boolean bUPD, bUK, bREW, bTarget, bFlexInsertCol, bFlexUpdateCol = false; public ColInfo(String pColName, String pColDt, String pColExpr, boolean pIsInsertCol, boolean pIsUpdateCol) { colName = pColName; colDt = pColDt; colExpr = pColExpr; bFlexInsertCol = pIsInsertCol; bFlexUpdateCol = pIsUpdateCol; } public void set(String pProperty, boolean v) { if (pProperty == PROP_TRG) bTarget = v; else if (pProperty == PROP_UPD) bUPD = v; else if (pProperty == PROP_UK) bUK = v; else if (pProperty == PROP_REW) bREW = v; else if (pProperty == PROP_FF_INSERT) bFlexInsertCol = v; else if (pProperty == PROP_FF_UPDATE) bFlexUpdateCol = v; }; public String getColName() { return colName; } public String getDataType() { return colDt; } public String getExpression() { return colExpr; } public boolean isTarget() { return bTarget; } public boolean isMapped() { return !colExpr.equals(EXPRESSION_NOT_SUPPORTED) && colExpr.trim().length() > 0; }; public boolean isInsertBy() { return bFlexInsertCol; } public boolean isUpdateBy() { return bFlexUpdateCol; } public boolean isbUPD() { return bUPD; } public boolean isbUK() { return bUK; } public boolean isbREW() { return bREW; } } /** * * @return Return the version of the code gen API. Used for testing that all * KMs in a session are using the same API version */ public static int getVersion() { return 1; } /** * Pass metadata into KM specific code generation , passes the metadata * information of the Table columns to the "cols and allTargetCols" * attributes so it can be used in the customized getColList() method * * @param pAllCols * - A delimited list of attribute names where the * attributes are active and mapped to a target * @param pAllDts * - A delimited list of attribute data types where the * attributes are active and mapped to a target * @param pAllExpr * - A delimited list of attribute expressions where the * attributes are active and mapped to a target * @param pTrgCols * - A delimited list of attribute names where the * attributes are active and the mapping expressions are executed * on the target * @param pUDPCols * - A delimited list of attribute names where the * attributes are active and the mapping expressions are marked * for update * @param pUKCols * - A delimited list of attribute names where the * attributes are active and the mapping expressions are * configured as the update key(s) * @param pREWCols * - A delimited list of attribute names where the * attributes are active and the mapping expressions are with * read only flag not selected * @param pAllInsertCols * - A delimited list of INSERT_LOAD_ID_COLUMN attribute * values of a mapping where the attributes are active and mapped * to a target * @param pAllUpdateCols * - A delimited list of UPDATE_LOAD_ID_COLUMN attribute * values of a mapping where the attributes are active and mapped * to a target * @param pAllTrgCols * - A delimited list of all target table attribute * names. Includes both active and non-active attributes * @param pAllTrgDts * - A delimited list of all target table attribute * data types. Includes both active and non-active * attributes * @param pAllTrgInsertCols * - A delimited list of all target table * INSERT_LOAD_ID_COLUM attribute values. Includes both * active and non-active attributes * @param pAllTrgUpdateCols * - A delimited list of all target table * UPDATE_LOAD_ID_COLUMN attribute values. Includes both * active and non-active attributes */ public void initMetadata(String pAllCols, String pAllDts, String pAllExpr, String pTrgCols, String pUDPCols, String pUKCols, String pREWCols, String pAllInsertCols, String pAllUpdateCols, String pAllTrgCols, String pAllTrgDts, String pAllTrgInsertCols, String pAllTrgUpdateCols) { String[] allCols = pAllCols.split(DELIMITER_REGEX, -1); String[] allDts = pAllDts.split(DELIMITER_REGEX, -1); String[] allExpr = pAllExpr.split(DELIMITER_REGEX, -1); String[] allInsertCols = pAllInsertCols.split(DELIMITER_REGEX, -1); String[] allUpdateCols = pAllUpdateCols.split(DELIMITER_REGEX, -1); String[] allTrgCols = pAllTrgCols.split(DELIMITER_REGEX, -1); String[] allTrgDts = pAllTrgDts.split(DELIMITER_REGEX, -1); String[] allTrgInsertCols = pAllTrgInsertCols .split(DELIMITER_REGEX, -1); String[] allTrgUpdateCols = pAllTrgUpdateCols .split(DELIMITER_REGEX, -1); /* Create all column objects */ cols = new LinkedHashMap(); for (int j = 0; j < allCols.length; j++) { String colName = allCols[j]; String colDt = allDts[j]; String colExpr = allExpr[j]; boolean isInsertCol = false; boolean isUpdateCol = false; /* * in case of a temporary target table, all FlexField based * parameters will contain an invalid value and must be ignored. */ if (!pAllInsertCols.startsWith(MISSING_FLEXFIELD_GETCOLLIST)) { isInsertCol = (allInsertCols[j].equals("0")) ? false : true; } if (!pAllUpdateCols.startsWith(MISSING_FLEXFIELD_GETCOLLIST)) { isUpdateCol = (allUpdateCols[j].equals("0")) ? false : true; } cols.put(colName, new ColInfo(colName, colDt, colExpr, isInsertCol, isUpdateCol)); } set(cols, ColInfo.PROP_TRG, pTrgCols.split(DELIMITER_REGEX)); set(cols, ColInfo.PROP_UPD, pUDPCols.split(DELIMITER_REGEX)); set(cols, ColInfo.PROP_UK, pUKCols.split(DELIMITER_REGEX)); set(cols, ColInfo.PROP_REW, pREWCols.split(DELIMITER_REGEX)); /* Create allTargetCols list */ allTargetCols = new LinkedHashMap(); for (int j = 0; j < allTrgCols.length; j++) { String colName = allTrgCols[j]; // Does this column already exist in cols ? ColInfo colObj = (ColInfo) cols.get(colName); if (colObj != null) // then lets copy it allTargetCols.put(colName, colObj); else { // otherwise it's a column without any mapping and we need to // create a new ColInfo Object for it String colDt = allTrgDts[j]; boolean isInsertCol = false; boolean isUpdateCol = false; /* * in case of a temporary target table, all FlexField based * parameters will contain an invalid value and must be ignored. */ if (!pAllInsertCols.startsWith(MISSING_FLEXFIELD_GETCOLLIST)) { isInsertCol = (allTrgInsertCols[j].equals("0")) ? false : true; } if (!pAllUpdateCols.startsWith(MISSING_FLEXFIELD_GETCOLLIST)) { isUpdateCol = (allTrgUpdateCols[j].equals("0")) ? false : true; } allTargetCols.put(colName, new ColInfo(colName, colDt, EXPRESSION_NOT_SUPPORTED, isInsertCol, isUpdateCol)); } } } /** * Set property pProperty (insert, update and TRG) for all columns listed in * pAllCols * * @param pAllCols * @param pProperty * @param pCols */ static void set(HashMap pAllCols, String pProperty, String[] pCols) { /* Check, if pCols just contains a single empty string */ if (pCols.length == 1 && pCols[0].length() == 0) return; /* Loop over all columns and set the respective property */ for (int j = 0; j < pCols.length; j++) { String colName = pCols[j]; ColInfo col = (ColInfo) pAllCols.get(colName); /* * Avoid NPE in case of an invalid input string => column not found, * e.g. in case of an invalid initialization string passed to * initMetadata */ if (col == null) throw new RuntimeException( "Custom Substitution API Append: set(): Internal Error: Cannot find column: " + colName); col.set(pProperty, true); } } /** * Extending the Standard getcollist() to the new customized private * getColList() Use to return the list of columns for each attribute from a * filtered list of attributes. The properties are organized according to a * string pattern. * * @param pStart * @param pPattern * @param pSeparator * @param pEnd * @param pSelector * @return return a string contains the list of columns for each attribute * from a filtered list of attributes. The properties are organized * according to a string pattern. */ public String getColList(String pStart, String pPattern, String pSeparator, String pEnd, String pSelector) { return getColList(cols, pStart, pPattern, pSeparator, pEnd, pSelector); } /** * Extending the Standard getAllTargetColList() to the new customized * private getColList(). Use to return information about all attributes of * the target table of a mapping, including active and non-active * attributes. Active attributes are those having an active mapping. * * @param pStart * @param pPattern * @param pSeparator * @param pEnd * @param pSelector * @return return a string the list of columns for each attribute from a * filtered list of attributes. The properties are organized * according to a string pattern. */ public String getAllTargetColList(String pStart, String pPattern, String pSeparator, String pEnd, String pSelector) { return getColList(allTargetCols, pStart, pPattern, pSeparator, pEnd, pSelector); } /** * The customized getcollist() to get the attribute list depending on * Predefined selectors. * * @param cols * A Map of COLINFO objects that represents the attributes * list to be filtered * * @param pStart * This sequence marks the beginning of the string to generate * @param pPattern * The pattern is repeated for each occurrence in the list. The * list of the attributes usable in a pattern is detailed in the * Pattern Attributes List below. Each occurrence of the * attributes in the pattern string is replaced by its value. * Attributes must be between brackets ([ and ]) Example «My * string [COL_NAME] is a attribute» * * @param pSeparator * This parameter separates each pattern from its predecessor. * @param pEnd * This sequence marks the end of the string to generate. * @param pSelector * String that designates a Boolean expression that allows to * filter the elements of the initial list with the following * format: etc. Parenthesis are * authorized. Authorized operators: No: NOT or! Or: OR or || * And: AND or && * * Example: (INS AND UPD) OR TRG The description of valid * selectors is provided below. * * @return a string contains the list of columns for each attribute from a * filtered list of attributes. The properties are organized * according to a string pattern. */ static private String getColList(LinkedHashMap cols, String pStart, String pPattern, String pSeparator, String pEnd, String pSelector) { StringBuffer rv = new StringBuffer(); if (!(pSelector.toUpperCase().equals(SELECTOR_INSERT) || pSelector.toUpperCase().equals(SELECTOR_UPDATE) || pSelector.toUpperCase().equals(SELECTOR_NOT_INSERT) || pSelector.toUpperCase().equals(SELECTOR_INSERT_AND_TARGET) || pSelector.toUpperCase().equals( SELECTOR_UPD_NotUK_NotTRG_NotINSERT_REW) || pSelector.toUpperCase().equals(SELECTOR_UPD_TRG_REW_UPDATE) || pSelector .toUpperCase().equals(SELECTOR_UPDATE_AND_TARGET))) { String msg = "Custom Substitution API Append: getColList(): invalid selector received: " + pSelector; /* * Not yet supported in ODI 11.1.1.6.0: throw new RuntimeException( * msg ); */ return msg; } Iterator iter = cols.keySet().iterator(); while (iter.hasNext()) { String colName = (String) iter.next(); ColInfo col = (ColInfo) cols.get(colName); /* * Avoid NPE in case of an invalid input string => column not found, * e.g. in case of an invalid initialization string passed to * initMetadata */ if (col == null) { String msg = "Custom Substitution API Append: getColList(): Internal Error: Cannot find column: " + colName; /* * Not yet supported in ODI 11.1.1.6.0: throw new * RuntimeException( msg ); */ return msg; } // /* Does the column match the selector? */ if ((pSelector.toUpperCase().equals(SELECTOR_INSERT) && (col .isInsertBy())) || (pSelector.toUpperCase().equals(SELECTOR_UPDATE) && (col .isUpdateBy())) || (pSelector.toUpperCase().equals(SELECTOR_NOT_INSERT) && (!col .isInsertBy())) || (pSelector.toUpperCase().equals( SELECTOR_INSERT_AND_TARGET) && (col.isInsertBy() && col .isTarget())) || (pSelector.toUpperCase().equals( SELECTOR_UPDATE_AND_TARGET) && (col.isUpdateBy() && col .isTarget())) || (pSelector.toUpperCase().equals( SELECTOR_UPD_TRG_REW_UPDATE) && (col.isbUPD() && col.isTarget() && col.isbREW() && col .isUpdateBy())) || (pSelector.toUpperCase().equals( SELECTOR_UPD_NotUK_NotTRG_NotINSERT_REW) && (col .isbUPD() && !col.isTarget() && !col.isbUK() && col.isbREW() && !col.isInsertBy())) || (pSelector.toUpperCase().equals(""))) { String s = pPattern; /* Replace all patterns with their respective values */ s = s.replace(PATTERN_COL_NAME, col.getColName()); s = s.replace(PATTERN_DEST_CRE_DT, col.getDataType()); s = s.replace(PATTERN_EXPRESSION, col.getExpression()); /* Handle EXPRESSION__NULL_IF_UNMAPPED_REGEX */ if (col.getExpression().equals(EXPRESSION_NOT_SUPPORTED)) { s = s.replace(PATTERN_EXPRESSION__NULL_IF_UNMAPPED, "cast(null as " + col.getDataType() + ")"); /* * cast is required to work-around HIVE-2305 UNION ALL on * different types throws runtime exception */ } else { s = s.replace(PATTERN_EXPRESSION__NULL_IF_UNMAPPED, col.getExpression()); } /* Handle MAPPED_ON_TARGET */ s = s.replace(PATTERN_MAPPED_ON_TARGET, (col.isTarget()) ? "1" : "0"); /* Handle UNMAPPED */ s = s.replace(PATTERN_UNMAPPED, (!col.isMapped()) ? "1" : "0"); /* Handle COL_NAME__EXPRESSION_IF_ON_TARGET */ s = s.replace( PATTERN_COL_NAME__EXPRESSION_IF_ON_TARGET, (col.isTarget()) ? col.getExpression() : ((!col .isMapped()) ? "cast(null as " + col.getDataType() + ")" : /* * cast is required to work-around HIVE-2305 UNION ALL * on different types throws runtime exception */ col.getColName())); /* Handle COL_NAME__NULL_IF_ON_TARGET */ s = s.replace(PATTERN_COL_NAME__NULL_IF_ON_TARGET, (col.isTarget() || !col.isMapped()) ? "cast(null as " + col.getDataType() + ")" : /* * cast is required to work-around HIVE-2305 UNION ALL * on different types throws runtime exception */ col.getColName()); /* Add separator for second and later columns */ if (rv.length() > 0) rv.append(pSeparator); rv.append(s); } } /* if any columns selected, insert/append pStart/pEnd */ if (rv.length() > 0) { rv.insert(0, pStart); rv.append(pEnd); } ; /* return buffer after unescaping control characters */ return rv .toString() .replaceAll( "" + (char) 92 + "Q" + (char) 92 + "n" + (char) 92 + "E", "" + (char) 10) .replaceAll( "" + (char) 92 + "Q" + (char) 92 + "t" + (char) 92 + "E", "" + (char) 9); } } %> <% import java.util.logging.Logger; CustomSubstitutionApi vfOdiRef = new CustomSubstitutionApi(); String sColList_INSERT_COLUMN = vfOdiRef.MISSING_FLEXFIELD_GETCOLLIST; String sColList_UPDATE_COLUMN = vfOdiRef.MISSING_FLEXFIELD_GETCOLLIST; String sTargetColList_INSERT_COLUMN = vfOdiRef.MISSING_FLEXFIELD_GETCOLLIST; String sTargetColList_UPDATE_COLUMN = vfOdiRef.MISSING_FLEXFIELD_GETCOLLIST; try { sColList_INSERT_COLUMN = odiRef.getColList("", "[ORACLE_INSERT_LOAD_ID_COLUMN]", ""+(char)1, "", ""); sColList_UPDATE_COLUMN = odiRef.getColList("", "[ORACLE_UPDATE_LOAD_ID_COLUMN]", ""+(char)1, "", ""); sTargetColList_INSERT_COLUMN = odiRef.getAllTargetColList("", "[ORACLE_INSERT_LOAD_ID_COLUMN]", ""+(char)1, "", ""); sTargetColList_UPDATE_COLUMN = odiRef.getAllTargetColList("", "[ORACLE_UPDATE_LOAD_ID_COLUMN]", ""+(char)1, "", ""); } catch (Exception e) { } String pAllCols=odiRef.getColList("","[COL_NAME]",""+(char)1,""); String pAllDts=odiRef.getColList("","[DEST_CRE_DT]",""+(char)1,""); String pAllExpr=odiRef.getColList("", "[EXPRESSION]", ""+(char)1,""); String pTrgCols=odiRef.getColList("","[COL_NAME]",""+(char)1,"","TRG"); String pUDPCols=odiRef.getColList("","[COL_NAME]",""+(char)1,"","UPD"); String pUKCols=odiRef.getColList("","[COL_NAME]",""+(char)1,"","UK"); String pREWCols=odiRef.getColList("","[COL_NAME]",""+(char)1,"","REW"); String pAllTrgCols=odiRef.getColList("","[COL_NAME]",""+(char)1,""); String pAllTrgDts=odiRef.getColList("","[DEST_CRE_DT]",""+(char)1,""); vfOdiRef.initMetadata(pAllCols,pAllDts,pAllExpr,pTrgCols,pUDPCols,pUKCols,pREWCols,sColList_INSERT_COLUMN,sColList_UPDATE_COLUMN,pAllTrgCols, pAllTrgDts,sTargetColList_INSERT_COLUMN, sTargetColList_UPDATE_COLUMN ); Logger logger = Logger.getLogger(""); logger.info(">>>>>>>>>>>> Tying to get insert"); logger.info(vfOdiRef.getColList("", "T.[COL_NAME]", "", "", "UPD AND TRG AND REW AND UPDATE")); logger.info(">>>>>>>>>>>> pAllCols " + pAllCols); logger.info(">>>>>>>>>>>> pAllDts " + pAllDts); logger.info(">>>>>>>>>>>> pAllExpr " + pAllExpr); logger.info(">>>>>>>>>>>> pTrgCols " + pTrgCols); logger.info(">>>>>>>>>>>> pUDPCols " + pUDPCols); logger.info(">>>>>>>>>>>> pUKCols " + pUKCols); logger.info(">>>>>>>>>>>> pREWCols " + pREWCols); logger.info(">>>>>>>>>>>> sColList_INSERT_COLUMN " + sColList_INSERT_COLUMN); logger.info(">>>>>>>>>>>> sColList_UPDATE_COLUMN " + sColList_UPDATE_COLUMN); logger.info(">>>>>>>>>>>> pAllTrgCols " + pAllTrgCols); logger.info(">>>>>>>>>>>> pAllTrgDts " + pAllTrgDts); logger.info(">>>>>>>>>>>> sTargetColList_INSERT_COLUMN " + sTargetColList_INSERT_COLUMN); logger.info(">>>>>>>>>>>> sTargetColList_UPDATE_COLUMN " + sTargetColList_UPDATE_COLUMN); logger.info(">>>>>>>>>>>> Tying to get insert"); logger.info(vfOdiRef.getAllTargetColList("INSERT : ", "[COL_NAME]\t[DEST_CRE_DT]", ",\n", "", "INSERT")); logger.info(">>>>>>>>>>>> Tying to get insert"); logger.info(vfOdiRef.getColList("INSERT : ","[COL_NAME]\t[DEST_CRE_DT]", ",\n", "", "INSERT")); %>

insCmd = """ insert into <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("SNP_JRN_SUBSCRIBER")%> ( JRN_TNAME, JRN_SUBSCRIBER, JRN_REFDATE, JRN_ROW_COUNT, JRN_DATA_CMD, JRN_COUNT_CMD ) values ( /* JRN_TNAME */ '<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>', /* JRN_SUBSCRIBER */ ?, /* JRN_REFDATE */ sysdate, /* JRN_ROW_COUNT */ 0, /* JRN_DATA_CMD */ null, /* JRN_COUNT_CMD */ 'update <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("SNP_JRN_SUBSCRIBER")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> SUBS set SUBS.JRN_ROW_COUNT=(select count(''X'') from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN where JRN.JRN_SUBSCRIBER=''$$SUBSCRIBER_NAME$$'') where SUBS.JRN_SUBSCRIBER=''$$SUBSCRIBER_NAME$$'' and SUBS.JRN_TNAME = ''<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>''' ) """
selCmd = """ select count('X') from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("SNP_JRN_SUBSCRIBER")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> SUBS where SUBS.JRN_SUBSCRIBER = ? and SUBS.JRN_TNAME = '<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>' """
# Prepare the statements prepInsStmt = myCon.prepareStatement(insCmd) prepSelStmt = myCon.prepareStatement(selCmd)
# Execute for each subscriber for sbs in lstSbs: prepSelStmt.setString(1, sbs) rs = prepSelStmt.executeQuery() rs.next() nbSubs = rs.getInt(1) if (nbSubs == 0): prepInsStmt.setString(1, sbs) nbRows = prepInsStmt.executeUpdate()
prepInsStmt.close() prepSelStmt.close()
# Commit the updates myCon.commit()

create table <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("SNP_JRN_SUBSCRIBER")%> ( JRN_TNAME <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "61")%> not null, JRN_SUBSCRIBER <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "400")%> not null, JRN_REFDATE <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_DATE")%> null, JRN_ROW_COUNT <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_NUMERIC", "20")%> null, JRN_DATA_CMD <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "2000")%> null, JRN_COUNT_CMD <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "2000")%> null, constraint PK_SNP_JRN_SBS primary key (JRN_TNAME, JRN_SUBSCRIBER) )

create table <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%> /* This table is created in the work physical schema of the current Data server */ ( JRN_SUBSCRIBER <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "400")%> not null, JRN_CONSUMED <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "1")%> null, JRN_FLAG <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "1")%> null, JRN_DATE <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_DATE")%> null, PROCESS_NAME <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "100")%> null, DATABASE_NAME <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "30")%> null, TABLE_NAME <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "30")%> null, <%=vfOdiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]\t[DEST_CRE_DT] null", ",\n\t", "", "INSERT")%> )

create or replace view <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_VIEW")%> /* This view is created in the work physical schema of the current Data server */ as select 'I' <%= odiRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN_FLAG, JRN.JRN_SUBSCRIBER <%= odiRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN_SUBSCRIBER <%=vfOdiRef.getColList("", "	, JRN.[COL_NAME]		" + odiRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD") + " [COL_NAME]", "
", "", "INSERT")%> <%=vfOdiRef.getColList("", "	, TARG.[COL_NAME]		" + odiRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD") + " [COL_NAME]", "
", "", "NOT INSERT")%> from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%> <%= odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> TARG inner join <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%> <%= odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN on <%=vfOdiRef.getColList("", "JRN.[COL_NAME]	= TARG.[COL_NAME]", "
and	", "", "INSERT")%>
